meanings.sent1: The cloudburst flooded the streets in minutes.
meanings.sent2: We were caught in a cloudburst during our picnic.
meanings.sent3: The cloudburst turned the park into a temporary swimming pool.
meanings.sent4: The cloudburst was like a waterfall from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The cloudburst drenched everything in sight.

meanings.definition: To rain heavily for a short period of time.
meanings.sent1: After a hot day, the sky cloudbursted in the evening.
meanings.sent2: The storm cloudbursted just as we reached home.
meanings.sent3: The clouds decided to cloudburst right when I hung my laundry out to dry.
meanings.sent4: The rain cloudbursted down like a drumbeat on the roof.
meanings.sent5: The garden was grateful for the cloudburst after days of dryness.
